name: mikroe.click.ltecat4
short_description: LTE Cat.4 Click (for Europe) is a compact add-on board made specially for 4G M2M and IoT applications in Europe. This board features the EG95EXGA-128-SGNS, an IoT/M2M-optimized LTE Cat.4 module that meets the 3GPP Release 11 standard from Quectel. It supports multiple wireless standards, including LTE-FDD, WCDMA, and GSM, ensuring broad network compatibility. Key features include multi-band LTE support (B1/B3/B7/B8/B20/B28), RX diversity for bands B1 and B8, and multi-constellation GNSS (GPS, GLONASS, BeiDou/Compass, Galileo, QZSS). It also integrates a 16-bit mono audio codec for voice functionality with support for CTIA standard headphones. Additionally, it offers a USB Type C connector for power and data transfer, AT command communication, and firmware upgrades.
